comments.author: Drant.5902
comments.body: It appears /v2/skills do not have a property that states whether the skill can be manually targeted on the ground (like necro marks or mesmer blink). I spotted this missing feature when recreating the game’s skills bar, which should have a red targeting icon over the hotkey for skills that are ground-targetable.
